LanguageData.CE_AutoLoader_DropAmmoDesc: Unload this ammo container's contents onto the floor.
LanguageData.CE_AutoLoader_ForceReloadDesc: Reload adjacent turrets immediately. Forbidden turrets and currently firing turrets will be ignored.
LanguageData.CE_AutoLoader_NoTurretToReload: {0} cannot find any adjacent available {1} turrets.
LanguageData.CE_AutoLoader_ToggleReplaceDesc: Choose whether or not the ammo container should replace turret's current ammo with the ammo type in the container.
LanguageData.CE_AutoLoaderBusy: Ammo container is reloading or being reloaded.
